pages.text: At the time of this this release, the mod, Conjuring is in ALPHA, which means not everything is working and the guide book cannot be opened. I have included this $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpcCFRmsIsY)Conjuring Spotlight$(/l) video to make getting started much easier. This video is for 1.16.5, but it is much the same now.$(br2)REI for 1.18 has not been released, so here are some of the recipes you will need.
